about_the_game:
Unlock the Founders Pack content along with additional exclusive items:

- 1 Core skin
- 1 Armure skin
- 1 Light effect
- 1 Banner frame
- 1 Banner background
- 1 Banner symbol
- 1 Elimination explosion
- 1 Emote
- 1 Title
- 2 Season pass tokens granting access to two season passes of your choice

This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena. If you already bought the Founders Pack, you will only unlock the additional exclusive items with this Premium one.

This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena. If you already bought the Founders Pack, you will only unlock the additional exclusive items with this Premium one.
name: Premium Founders Pack - BattleCore Arena
short_description: Get access to the content of the Founders Pack along with an emote, a title, and one additional season pass token. This offer will only be available during the early access phase of BattleCore Arena.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
